name: Super Bird Adv. - Old school platformer game
name_original: Super Bird Adv. - Old school platformer game
description:
----ALSO AVAILABLE IN GOOGLE PLAY----
Like rayman Advance, Super Mario bro (run), better than lep's world!
Super Bird Advance a traditional platformer game. Just keep walking and jumping to clear the levels!

Super Bird Advance Background:
Our super bird is on vacation with his girlfriend.But a giant evil Kong kidnaps his girlfriend. Super bird needs your help to clear the levels to save his pretty girlfriend!

Super Bird Advance Features:
+3 forms of super bird.
+9 special abilities.
+10 demanding enemies.
+8 power up items in level,8 assisted items in shop.
+3 worlds with 32 interesting and challenging levels.
+More than 30 mechanism and hazards make every level totally different.
+iPhone 5,6,Plus widescreen support.
+Retina Display support.
+Universal support.
+Game Center achievements & Leaderboards.
+Share result with friends through twitter and sina weibo.
+Free levels in upcoming updates.
